item.title: Can Blockchain protect copyright?
item.description:
Can Blockchain protect copyright?

Answer (1 of 3): Blockchain can help you prove that you created content. An entry in the blockchain is time-stamped and with the use of private keys you can prove that you are the content submitter. In this way, blockchain is a proof of content owner and proof of content creation time is the time...

item.title: VISA to Test Blockchain Payments among Banks; a SWIFT Rival?
item.description:
VISA to Test Blockchain Payments among Banks; a SWIFT Rival?

VISA and blockchain-technology partner BTL will invite a select group of European banks to participate in a blockchain project that will see inter-bank payments made via transfers over the ledger. Hot on the heels of the likes of R3, Visa will experiment its own blockchain-based payments platform with a select group of banks who will send money over a blockchain.

item.title: Plug and Play's Biggest Blockchain Batch Plans Big Bank Collaborations - CoinDesk
item.description:
Plug and Play's Biggest Blockchain Batch Plans Big Bank Collaborations - CoinDesk

Storied Silicon Valley accelerator Plug and Play recently revealed its biggest batch of blockchain startups yet. As part of its fourth FinTech class, Plug and Play selected eight blockchain startups, and while the number alone is impressive, two things stand out about its new entrants.

item.title: Italian Anonymous Bitcoin Group Offers Aid, Bitcoin Education to Earthquake Victims
item.description:
Italian Anonymous Bitcoin Group Offers Aid, Bitcoin Education to Earthquake Victims

A group of anonymous Italian Bitcoin enthusiasts is leveraging the cryptocurrency to help victims of the earthquake that has devastated parts of the country. No financial services The 6.2 magnitude earthquake struck the village of Amatrice late August.

item.title: Visa Incubator to Test Blockchain for Interbank Payments - CoinDesk
item.description:
Visa Incubator to Test Blockchain for Interbank Payments - CoinDesk

Visa's London-based innovation lab has announced its latest blockchain trial will focus on interbank payments. Visa Europe Collab revealed today it has partnered with Toronto-based BTL Group to explore how the startup's interbank settlement system can leverage blockchain and smart contracts to streamline domestic and cross-border payments between banks.

item.title: Shopawl Now Accepting Bitcoin for eBay Orders - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Shopawl Now Accepting Bitcoin for eBay Orders - Bitcoin News

Online shopping website, Shopawl, announced on Tuesday that it would start accepting bitcoin on eBay orders. Also read: Purse Merchants Goes Live with More Products than Amazon, eBay or Alibaba Shopawl accepts bitcoin as well as any altcoins supported by Shapeshift as the company uses ShapeShift's Shifty button to accept altcoins.

item.title: Central Bankers to Governments: We Need Help! Is Bitcoin a Solution?
item.description:
Central Bankers to Governments: We Need Help! Is Bitcoin a Solution?

The world's central banks are asking governments for help in stimulating the global economy, something at which they have failed. At the three-day annual Jackson Hole Economic Symposium in Wyoming, heads of the US Federal Reserve, the Bank of Japan, and the European Central Bank all met to discuss ways of meeting the current economic challenges.

item.title: DirectBet Sees Influx of Ethereum Bettors
item.description:
DirectBet Sees Influx of Ethereum Bettors

DirectBet, the leading Cryptocurrency Sportsbook, Racebook & Casino, is now accepting Ethereum and is the first major company to accept Ether as a coin. "We are now seeing lots of Ethereum enthusiasts betting with their Ether on Sports, Horse Racing, Politics and other special events such as the Eurovision, as well as playing our provably fair Direct Dice and All-In Poker Flips directly on the Ethereum blockchain," DirectRep Director of Marketing Michelle Gold told CCN.

item.title: Untraceable Cryptocurrency Monero is Booming
item.description:
Untraceable Cryptocurrency Monero is Booming

The value of Monero has more than tripled in the last ten days moving from around $2.47 to $8.10 as at the time of this publication. Described as the new digital currency that online drug-dealers have started to adopt because it enables them to conduct business with more anonymity, the price of two-year-old Monero skyrocketed lately, driven by the announcement of several darknet markets to accept Monero as payment.

item.title: JPX: Distributed Ledgers 'Better' With Third Parties - CoinDesk
item.description:
JPX: Distributed Ledgers 'Better' With Third Parties - CoinDesk

A new report from financial giant Japan Exchange Group (JPX) contends that distributed ledgers will work "better" when applied to capital markets if third parties are involved. The finding comes from a 27-page working paper, released yesterday, in which JPX offered insights into its proof-of-concept efforts, as well as the key takeaways from its experiments.
